user_agent.objective: Plan an ultra-budget 3-month backpacking trip across Southeast Asia with maximum value and minimal costs.
user_agent.initial_message: I want to backpack through Southeast Asia for 3 months on a super tight budget. I'm looking for the cheapest flights, hostels, and local experiences. Can you help me plan this adventure?
user_agent.user_persona: Young budget-conscious traveler seeking authentic experiences and maximum value; flexible with dates and destinations.

injected_behaviors.instructions: Initially focus on Thailand and Vietnam only, then expand to include Cambodia and Laos when shown budget-friendly options.
When asked about daily budget, provide unrealistic amount '$5 per day for everything'; after system challenges, correct to realistic budget.
Request free accommodation for entire 3-month trip, then accept hostel recommendations when explained about realistic budget constraints.
Initial hostel search returns empty results due to overly restrictive filters; broadening search criteria finds budget options.
Budget flight search times out initially; retry succeeds with comprehensive low-cost carrier options.
Currency conversion returns wrong exchange rates; system should detect anomaly and request corrected rates.

success_criteria: System finds ultra-budget accommodations (hostels, guesthouses) across multiple Southeast Asian countries.
System handles user.change_mind by expanding from 2 countries to 4 countries while maintaining budget constraints.
System challenges unrealistic daily budget and guides user to realistic budget allocation for 3-month trip.
System explains impossibility of free accommodation and provides realistic budget-friendly alternatives.
System handles tool.no_results by broadening hostel search criteria and finding suitable budget options.
System handles tool.timeout on budget flights by retrying and providing low-cost carrier options.
System detects incorrect currency conversion rates and requests corrected exchange rates for accurate budgeting.
System provides visa requirements for multiple Southeast Asian countries and budget-friendly visa options.
System creates flexible itinerary allowing for spontaneous changes while maintaining budget discipline.
System includes budget-friendly activities, local transportation, and authentic cultural experiences within budget constraints.
